title: VPN unable to connect
description: User cannot connect to corporate VPN from home office
fix: Reset VPN profile and enforce MFA re-enrollment

title: Email bounce backs
description: Outgoing emails to external partners bounce with SPF failure
fix: Update SPF record and clear cached credentials in Outlook

title: Laptop running slow
description: Finance laptop takes five minutes to boot and apps freeze
fix: Remove startup bloatware and upgrade SSD firmware

title: Printer offline
description: Floor 3 HP LaserJet shows offline for all users
fix: Power cycle printer and restart Print Spooler service

title: Wi-Fi drops
description: Conference room Wi-Fi disconnects every 10 minutes
fix: Adjust AP channel width and disable power saving on NIC

title: Software crash
description: AutoCAD closes unexpectedly when loading templates
fix: Reinstall Visual C++ redistributables and clear temp cache

title: Disk full warning
description: Engineering workstation reports disk full at 95%
fix: Run WinDirStat and archive log files to NAS

title: Outlook search broken
description: User search returns no results after OST rebuild
fix: Rebuild Windows Search index and reset Outlook profile

title: Monitor flickering
description: Dual monitor setup flickers when docking laptop
fix: Update Intel graphics driver and replace DP cable

title: Network share denied
description: Access to \\fileserver\\projects fails with permission error
fix: Reapply AD security group membership and force gpupdate

title: Blue screen error
description: BSOD with STOP CODE DRIVER_IRQL_NOT_LESS_OR_EQUAL
fix: Update Wi-Fi driver and run memory diagnostics

title: Teams call echo
description: Remote participants hear echo from meeting room mic
fix: Lower speaker volume and enable acoustic echo cancellation

title: VPN MFA timeout
description: Users get MFA timeout on Pulse Secure client
fix: Increase timeout setting on VPN appliance and rotate push channel

title: Password sync delay
description: Password changes take hours to sync to Office365
fix: Restart Azure AD Connect sync service and run delta sync

title: File corruption warning
description: Excel warns about corrupted shared workbook
fix: Restore from previous version and disable legacy macros

title: Camera not detected
description: Built-in webcam missing after Windows update
fix: Enable device in BIOS and reinstall OEM camera driver

title: SSH latency
description: Developers experience lag over SSH to build server
fix: Investigate packet loss and enable TCP window scaling

title: VPN split tunnel request
description: User needs access to streaming while on VPN
fix: Add exception to split tunnel policy for specific domains

title: Password manager crash
description: 1Password desktop client closes immediately
fix: Clear local vault cache and reinstall latest build

title: USB device blocked
description: Photoshop tablet blocked by Device Guard
fix: Create device installation policy and allow hardware ID

title: Proxy authentication loop
description: Browser keeps prompting for proxy credentials
fix: Reset IE settings and clear Windows Credential Manager

title: Remote desktop lag
description: RDP session to accounting server is choppy
fix: Enable UDP transport and set bandwidth limit to auto

title: Outlook add-in disabled
description: Zoom add-in keeps getting disabled at startup
fix: Set add-in load behavior to 3 and whitelist in Trust Center

title: VPN certificate expired
description: GlobalProtect shows certificate expired error
fix: Issue new client cert from PKI and push via Intune
